title: JUST IN: EU and UK say they have reached a deal on Brexit
text:
The European Union and UK have reached a historic Brexit deal, paving the way for Britain’s departure from the European Union after three years of negotiations. The pound rallied and UK stocks turned higher.



Any agreement still has to be ratified in the UK Parliament, where British Prime Minister Boris Johnson lacks a majority. Northern Ireland’s Democratic Unionist Party, which had earlier refused to back a deal, is yet to comment. Its support will be crucial if Johnson is to get a deal through Westminster.
description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson says that UK Parliament should 'get Brexit done on Saturday'.
